cinimaticCaption.caption: ARBITER: Restraints off.
ARBITER: Your judgement has waited long enough.
ANDERS: Just get it over with.
ARBITER: The ancients have granted us the power to doom your race.
Let the deconstruction of our gifts begin!
The majesty of our new fleet will be unparalleled!
ANDERS: Nothing ventured....
Surface.
ANDERS: Hmm...that worked out pretty well.
Or maybe not....
FORGE: Lady, I haven't got all day - you want to be rescued or not?
